fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Find the zeroes of a player at night, the list of all players they’ve never visited before, at the cost of 7 points.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If they’ve never visited any member of the Mathematics faction before, including dead ones, they become “Solved 2 by 2”.
If they have, they will be added to your square.
Once you’ve completed the square, meaning you have four players added to your list, you will redirect them all to visit you the same night you completed it. Additionally, any Mathematics attacks done to these players in the future will cost half as many points.
Once all players in the completed square are dead, the faction gains 16 points and you may change your role into any other role within the faction for free.
